code:
--- title: My Posts Tab - Flowchart --- flowchart TD Start([User opens My Posts Tab]) CheckAuth{User authenticated?} RedirectLogin[Redirect to Login] LoadUserPosts[Load user's posts] HasPosts{Has posts?} ShowEmpty[Show empty state
"No posts yet"
+ Create Post button] DisplayPosts[Display posts list
- Post title
- Description preview
- Build thumbnail
- Vote count
- Comment count
- Date posted] ShowActions[Show post actions
- Create New Post
- Sort by: Date, Votes
- Filter: All, Public, Draft] UserAction{User action} %% Post Actions SelectPost[Select specific post] ViewPostDetail[View post details
- Full description
- Build configuration
- All comments
- Vote statistics] PostDetailAction{Post action} EditPost[Edit post
- Update title
- Update description
- Modify build config] DeletePost[Delete post] ViewStats[View post analytics
- Views
- Votes over time
- Comment engagement] SharePost[Share post link] %% Create New Post CreateNewPost[Navigate to Create Post] %% Confirmation dialogs ConfirmDelete{Confirm delete post?} PerformDelete[Remove post from database] %% Filters and Sorting ApplySort[Apply sort option] ApplyFilter[Apply status filter] RefreshPosts[Refresh posts list] End([End]) Start --> CheckAuth CheckAuth -->|No| RedirectLogin CheckAuth -->|Yes| LoadUserPosts RedirectLogin --> End LoadUserPosts --> HasPosts HasPosts -->|No| ShowEmpty HasPosts -->|Yes| DisplayPosts ShowEmpty --> CreateNewPost CreateNewPost --> End DisplayPosts --> ShowActions ShowActions --> UserAction UserAction -->|Select Post| SelectPost UserAction -->|Create New| CreateNewPost UserAction -->|Sort| ApplySort UserAction -->|Filter| ApplyFilter UserAction -->|Refresh| RefreshPosts UserAction -->|Exit| End SelectPost --> ViewPostDetail ViewPostDetail --> PostDetailAction PostDetailAction -->|Edit| EditPost PostDetailAction -->|Delete| ConfirmDelete PostDetailAction -->|View Stats| ViewStats PostDetailAction -->|Share| SharePost PostDetailAction -->|Back| DisplayPosts ConfirmDelete -->|Yes| PerformDelete ConfirmDelete -->|No| ViewPostDetail PerformDelete --> LoadUserPosts EditPost --> End ViewStats --> End SharePost --> End ApplySort --> RefreshPosts ApplyFilter --> RefreshPosts RefreshPosts --> DisplayPosts
